column1: #Text=Tonraq says : " The White Lotus has honored my family by coming .
#Text=" White Lotus leader says : " We have investigated many claims , both here and in the Northern Tribe .
#Text=All have turned out to be false .
#Text=" Senna says : " Then you should be happy to know , your search has come to an end .
#Text=" White Lotus leader says : " What makes you so sure your daughter is the one ?
